thread.title: Poland Pledges to Save Coal Mines Despite Pulling Latest Rescue Plan
thread.title_full: Poland Pledges to Save Coal Mines Despite Pulling Latest Rescue Plan - WSJ

author: Martin M. Sobczyk
title: Poland Pledges to Save Coal Mines Despite Pulling Latest Rescue Plan
text:
WARSAW--The Polish government said on Thursday it would come up with a new plan to save some of its coal mines but would take longer than previously thought after the European Commission questioned an existing rescue plan.
The European Unionâ€™s executive arm said it would likely reject the plan, under which state-controlled companies were to pool...
